comments:
I set my breakpoints to "group by project" and got this exception. The 
breakpoints were being displayed by custom groups before the operation.

Created an attachment (id=15263)
image of breakpoints view

After the exception one of the groups rendered without a name, as shown.

Fixed in BreakpointProjectContainerFactory. I accidentally added code to dispose 
the "other" ("(no project)") image. This image is managed by the workbench and 
shouldn't be manually disposed.

Please verify, DW.
